Spaßiges Knobelspiel, das nicht nur interessante Spielmechaniken zu bieten hat, sondern auch eine gehörige Portion schwarzen Humor.

Muy bueno, espero que Portal 2 sea más y mejor. Están muy bien los mapas avanzados y los desafíos para seguir jugando después de haber superado el "modo historia", aunque los desafíos son prácticamente imposibles.
Simply a masterpiece, some of the GLaDOS lines will stay in my memory forever.
作为经典的传送门系列第一作，可以找到的缺点就只有一个，关卡切换还是有明显的生硬感。除此之外，剧情非常的优秀，关卡设计非常巧妙，音乐音效堪称完美，操作方式前所未有，作为一款解密类游戏实在是值得一玩，尤其是GLaDOS这种非常具有讽刺意味的BOSS在一直指引Shell的剧本简直是设计的亮点。总而言之，非常具有突破性的一款游戏。
操作和解謎難度適，配上少量新穎劇情。適合不同類型玩家。
It's shorter than a gnat's dick but what it has is amazing

Whatever words I have for describing this game don't do justice to it. One of the most fascinating puzzle games I have ever played. Some puzzles might seem daunting but don't give up on it. You will cherish the experience for a long time to come.

This Valve game offers an enviroment in which logical thinking is necessary. If you're looking for an action, gory game, then this product is not suitable for you. It's like playing chess, but with a few turrets. The protagonist is basically a laboratory rat that has to beat all the levels. Glados plays a big role in this game. It's a robot with cores that look like big robotic eyeballs which each of them represents a human trait. Like in Half Life 2, Glados was a test that gone wrong, so she basically became intelligent enough to have her own "head" Glados is owned by Aperature Science, a lab full of obstacles in which you create portals using portal gun

When I saying to a friend, i'm going to play the first game in the series, he recommended that I skipped this one (It is just you doing GlaDoS' tests. NNOOOO, it is more than that.. I played it before and found it very difficult to play. Now, in one sitting, I finished the story. And, WOW. The story is great. at a certain point in the game, you will notice a change in the atmosphere of the game. Mystery and lots questions. 
10/10 the replay value is high.
Must own title

A great game full of mind-bending puzzles with an awesome game mechanic. Demands multiple playthroughs and I find myself coming back to it regularly. Would recommend to anyone with a basic understanding on how to play computer games, as most people enjoy the experience.

[h1]90/100[/h1]

O jogo é divertido e desafiador, te permite inclusive à colocar em pratica o que você aprende em outros jogos baseados na mesma engine como CS e HL como bunnyhop pra passar em determinadas partes.

Jogo desde os 11 anos e tendo essa experiência ainda hoje me traz muito orgulho de mim mesmo superar os puzzles e ver quantas outras formas você pode criar pra realizar um teste. Com toda certeza assim como a franquia HL vou rejogar sempre que sentir saudades.

Here is my review for this cake:

Good:
Perfect amount of flour and eggs put together.
The salt and sugar go together like peanut butter and jelly.
The vanilla gives it an amazing texture.

Bad:
The icing is too thin.

Overall:
9/10. Very good cake. Would bake again. And again. And again.

(Seriously though, Portal is an awesome game. 9/10. If you get the chance, it's very worth buying and playing.)
